title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Mary Technology is building the legal Fact Layer for agentic AI on AWS
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Mary Technology 如何在 AWS 上为智能体 AI 构建法律事实层
abstract: Discover how Mary Technology is transforming dispute resolution by cutting through the “fact chaos” buried in emails, PDFs and chats. This lightning talk shows how agentic AI manufactures verified, source-linked facts and persists them as a reusable Fact Layer - the next gap to unlock legal AI at scale - so teams move from confusion to clear, defensible outcomes faster, with transparency and trust.
abstract_cn: 了解 Mary Technology 如何通过突破埋藏在电子邮件、PDF 和聊天记录中的"事实混乱"来变革争议解决。这个闪电演讲展示了代理 AI 如何制造经过验证的、源链接的事实，并将其持久化为可重用的事实层——这是大规模解锁法律 AI 的下一个缺口——让团队更快地从混乱转向清晰、可辩护的结果，同时保持透明度和信任。
